entry.title: Sunday night: Clearing. Low minus 31.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Clearing this evening. Blowing snow at times. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming north 40 gusting to 60 near midnight. Low minus 31. Wind chill near minus 48. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Mainly sunny. High minus 29.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the afternoon. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 29. Wind chill minus 47 in the morning and minus 42 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 33.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming clear late in the evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 33. Wind chill near minus 47. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CST Sunday 22 January 2023
